annotations.description: I've been playing D&D for years and tonight I'm going to stream the first session I've run in a long time, and I'm making some setting appropriate drinks for...
annotations.title: Dungeons & Dragons Drinks | How to Drink

textContent:
34oz. -or- 1L. Scotch Ale
17 oz. -or- 500 ml. Viking Blod Mead
5 oz. -or- 120 ml. Oleo Saccharum
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Cinnamon Syrup
9 oz. -or- 250 ml. Orange Juice
Garnish with Nutmeg

Mix and pour

Tavern Punch (single)
4.25 oz. -or- 126 ml. Scotch Ale
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Viking Blod Mead
.5 oz. -or- 30 ml. Oleo Saccharum
.25 oz. -or- 15 ml. Cinnamon Syrup
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Orange Juice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uu-vM8CLJrI
title: Tavern Punch
